---

EZID prefix/shoulder: doi:10.1234/X5 OR ark:/12345/x5
Account/organization username (login): ezid-admin
Shoulder display name: EZID Admin
Datacenter: CDL.ABC (or leave blank if Crossref prefix or ARK)
